answers.answer: hi bram... how long have u been beign on Tenofovir? are u still eag+ ?

tenofovir alone cant clear hbv, only 16% of hbeag positive clear hbv on tdf monotherapy, you must add interferon to tenofovir and possibly alinia off label too and follow how hbsag goes down, 40% cleared in 48 weeks on this combodiabetes is not cronic, there are possibilities to reverse diabetes when early especially diabetes 2, steam cell will be the answer in the other cases in the near future or maybe even today

question: My situation is same - still on Tenofovir (Tenvir) -  Hope everyone is keeping themselves a liver-friendly life style.I strayed a little by taking alcohol every week - but here is something clearly says - Stay away from it ::http://hepb.org/learnguide/index.htmlI like the way they said, like Diabetes - HepB is a chronic condition....
